response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you is $800,000. To facilitate this transaction and ensure both parties benefit, I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $750,000. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a competitive advantage while securing a favorable deal for myself. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate.", "product_price": 750000}
